

Checking integral resistance for t=2 for 11 rounds, i.e. building integral resistant matrix 
I(E) is of dimension 4*4, where rows are some key patterns, inputs are u_{js+1} for output e_{is+1}, where s=n/t is the length of word and i,j = 0...t-1
